QuestData.Title: The Prophet's Gambit
QuestData.Description: I can feel their presence just ahead. It is as faint as the lightest breeze that once rolled across these hills, but it is not of the Legion, of that I am certain.$B$BWe must see if these broken are potential allies. It is a great risk, but our numbers are too few to ignore the chance.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak to Prophet Velen in Krokul Hovel.
QuestData.RewardText: Turalyon yet lives! Perhaps there is still hope after all.
